chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
w: world
this: nid
l: Equality.sort Label
s: UMC.sort (union_mapUMC Label dstatelet)

Goal:
l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (gets s l)) =i nodes (getp l) (gets s l)

Premises:
Notation gets := getStatelet
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
union_mapUMC : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V
Notation getp := (getProtocol w)
Notation UMC T m := (UMC.pack m)
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
Module Equality := Struct Definition block : forall A : Type, A -> A. Parameter JMeq_eq_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), JMeq_eq JMeq_refl = erefl x. Parameter UIP_refl_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), UIP_refl A x (erefl x) = erefl (erefl x). Parameter inj_pairT2_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (P : A -> Type) (p : P x), inj_pairT2 A P x p p (erefl (existT P x p)) = erefl p. Record DependentEliminationPackage (A : Type) : Type := Build_DependentEliminationPackage { elim_type : Type;
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (gets s l)] : world -> Pred state
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
getsE : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> find l s = Some (gets s l)
coh_s : forall (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getp l) (gets s l)
coh_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state) (l : Label), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (gets s l)
cohD : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> dom w =i dom s
Coh0 : forall (w : world) (s : state), w = Unit -> s = Unit -> Coh w s
cohS : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid s
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (gets i k)) -> getl n (gets (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (gets i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
unit_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> w = Unit < -> s = Unit
cohW : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid w
cohH : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> hook_complete w
sorted_max_key_last : forall (A : ordType) (s : seq A) (x y : A), sorted oleq s -> x \in s -> (forall z : A, z \in s -> oleq z x) -> last y s = x
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getl n d = getl n {| dstate := upd m (getl m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
Transitions.s_safe_in : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d
s_safe_in : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d
sorted_last_key_max : forall (A : ordType) (s : seq A) (x y : A), sorted oleq s -> x \in s -> oleq x (last y s)
seq_last_in : forall (A : eqType) (s : seq A) (x : A), last x s \notin s -> s = [::]
get_coh : forall l : Label, cohpred (Protocols.nodes (getp l))
sorted_oleq : forall (T : ordType) (s : seq T), sorted ord s -> sorted oleq s
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
mt_nodes = (fun _evar_0_ : [::] =i [::] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq [ordType of nid] => _pattern_value_ =i [::]) _evar_0_ (dom0 (union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap))) (fun x : [ordType of nid] => erefl (x \in [::])) : dom (dstate empty_dstatelet) =i [::]
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
pred0v3 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
domK : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 g1 g2 : U), valid (f1 \+ g1) -> valid (f2 \+ g2) -> dom (f1 \+ g1) =i dom (f2 \+ g2) -> dom f1 =i dom f2 -> dom g1 =i dom g2
Transitions.s_safe_def : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d msg < -> (exists (b : heap) (pf : Transitions.send_safe s this to d msg), Transitions.send_step pf = Some b)
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : seq A -> Prop), P [::] -> (forall (a : A) (l : seq A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : seq A, P l
Transitions.s_safe_coh : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> coh d
